Cine_7: ^I'm sorry you guys lost the Battle of the Bands, and I know you hate me. But can you guys hear me out now?
^Why should we? How do we know you're not just gonna lie to our faces even more?
^Promises are pointless if you break them.
^I say we just hear him out.
^Thank you. I admit, at first I just wanted to get experience to put on my application. I figured college might be the best option for me.
^But that changed after working with you guys. I really love being with you guys and helping out. I don't care about the college anymore, I want to stay here.
^So you would rather keep playing with us?
^Yes! If you guys will let me?
^It's not that easy. We trusted you, and then we find out you were lying to us? No shot we let you rejoin.
^I agree with MJ. We can't just take your word for it now after what you did.
^For the record, I'm not totally opposed to letting you back in. But you gotta give us some reasons to trust you again first.
^I can live with that. I'll do whatever I can to earn it back from you guys.
^Now if you're done. We have stuff to do.
^Oh, yeah. I understand. I should probably figure something out myself.
^And I think I know where I can start. Gotta make some flyers and post them first.
